name: Perry the Pumpkin
description:
Something Is Wrong With Everything!

Halloween is not going as expected this year. It is up to Perry the Pumpkin to save it!

In this epic platformer, you will play as Perry the Pumpkin. Each area you encounter will reveal more about the secrets of what is causing the mayhem with the spookiest of holidays. As you progress, Perry will learn new abilities and unlock other magical items. The world is also filled with a variety of power-ups. Go from walking around to flying around on a broom.

Special Features

  • Play as Perry the Pumpkin: What's cooler than that?
  • Need more evidence: Perry attacks by spitting pumpkin seeds at enemies.
  • There are a variety of items and power-ups that can be collected.
  • Did we mention you can get your own magic broom?
  • Explore a small town and meet unique characters.
  • Everything is basically themed around Halloween! Awesome!
  • Uncover mysteries and complete tasks for your new friends.
  • Entirely created and conceived by a son and his father.
